tool_description: Connects to various shipping carrier APIs to retrieve tracking information, create shipments, and manage carrier services. Handles authentication and rate limiting for multiple carriers.

carrier_name.description: Name of the shipping carrier (UPS, FedEx, USPS, DHL, etc.)

api_key.description: API authentication key for the carrier

operation.description: API operation to perform: track, create_shipment, get_rates, cancel_shipment

shipment_data.description: JSON string containing shipment details for create operations

error_messages: Invalid carrier name: Supported carriers are UPS, FedEx, USPS, DHL, OnTrac, LaserShip.
Authentication failed: Verify API key is valid and has necessary permissions.
Invalid operation: Use one of [track, create_shipment, get_rates, cancel_shipment].
Missing tracking number: tracking_number is required for track operations.
Invalid shipment data: shipment_data must be valid JSON for create_shipment operations.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests to carrier API, implement exponential backoff.
usage: Specify carrier_name, api_key, and operation. For tracking, include tracking_number. For shipment creation, include shipment_data as JSON string.

status.description: API call status: success or error

response_data.description: Raw JSON response from carrier API
